item.title: .addClass()
item.description: .addClass() Method Method adds one or more classes to the selected elements Example $(() => { $("#addBorderClass").click(() => { // add .strongBorder to box $(".box").addClass("strongBorder") }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com

item.title: .removeClass()
item.description: .removeClass() Method Method removes one or more classes from selected elements Example $(() => { $("#removeBorderClass").click(() => { // remove .strongBorder to box $(".box").removeClass("strongBorder") }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com

item.title: .toggleClass()
item.description: .toggleClass() Method Method toggles one or more classes to / from selected elements Example $(() => { $("#toggleBorderClass").click(() => { // toggle .strongBorder on box $(".box").toggleClass("strongBorder") }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com
